name: A Story in the City
description:
This is my first go at making a game. Written on Bitsy. It's not finished, but I will be adding to it. I've had bits and pieces of this narrative in my head for a decade
now. I found this game creator and decided to combine them into this format.
I sincerely hope you enjoy what I've made.

10/25
- Added several new pages to the end

-Added characters, developed depth of conversation

-Adjusted triggering events

-Cleaned up some typos

-changed protesters to be able to speak

-gender neutrality - they/them check

10/26

-increased anarchism/antiauthoritarianism by 47%

-fixed dialogue formatting

-added depth to dialogue

-added names to characters

-adjusted endings/exits to be more accurate as to outcomes and help player move forward.

10/27

Added some clarity to event triggers.

A few more pages of gameplay.

Better dialogue.
